name: Boxman
description:
Boxman

Controls
WASD Keys - Move
Mouse Cursor - Aim
Left Click - Shoot

Created by
Michael Sim

Sound
Koji Kondo - Character Select // Super Mario Bros. 2
Jake Kaufman - High Above the Land (The Flying Machine) // Shovel Knight
Nobuo Uematsu - Victory Fanfare // Final Fantasy VI
Sound effects from the Mega Man series by Capcom

Game developed as part of the  Academy of Art University 
Pre-College Art Experience Program in Summer 2016.

All audio belongs to its respective owners
Originally published on August 6, 2016
